pages.text: A nimble twin-bladed Vairis sword allows you to quickly deal damage to the enemy and can apply the Sticky Shackles effect to them.$(br)Can be crafted on Lithum Altar, using $(#ea7f17)$(l)80 000 DE$() and following items:$(li)Vairis Crystal$(o) [Main]$()$(li)Vairis Crystal $(o)[x3]$()$(li)Stick $(o)[x2]$()$(br2)Recovery after full ritual: $(#992032)$(l)1000 DRP$()
